entities.name: chair
entities.description: The chair was drawn in midair with a wand. It revolved for a few seconds before falling between Professors Snape and McGonall.

entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is one of the professors at the table.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is one of the professors at the table. She is impatient and encourages Professor Trelawney to sit down.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a professor who believes that thirteen dining together will be unlucky.

entities.name: headmaster
entities.description: The Headmaster is the person in charge of the group. Professor McGonagall refers to him as 'Headmaster'.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is a professor who is missing from the table.

entities.name: table
entities.description: The table is where the professors are dining.

entities.name: turkey
entities.description: The turkey is getting stone cold.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney is at the table.
Professor Trelawney is looking for Professor Lupin.
The chair falls between Professors Snape and McGonall.
Professor McGonagall encourages Professor Trelawney to sit down.
